description: Magic dirived directly fromthe gods of the realm
rules: The use of magic is governed by the Gods
The Gods deem who is worthy to weild this magic
The Gods accept responsibility for its use

examples.Healing: Used by practisioners to heal those in need
examples.Divine Smite: Useable by practisioners to smite their enemies
examples.Portent: Used to invoke the gods of the realm knowledge

name: The Divines

description: Magic used by the natural forces of the realm
rules: The use of magic is governed by the realm's natural forces
Practisioners hold each other responsible for its use
Those who misuse this magic are marked as wicked and punished

examples.Healing: Used by practisioners to heal those in need
examples.Growth: Used by the likes of Druids to enhance plant growth
examples.Sense: Used by individuals to sense their surroundings

name: Nature's Path

description: Magic used developed by powerful scholars and mystics
rules: The use of magic is governed by the realm's magical forces
Powerful orders define and enforce laws and rules

examples.Healing: Used by practisioners to heal those in need
examples.Transmute: Highly regulated spell used from transforming materials into other materials
examples.Haste: Advanced spell used to speed up the flow of time for the caster
examples.Shield: Basic spell used to protect the caster

name: The Arcane
